attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Thank you for your submission. Regretfully we are unable to accept your petition due to the criminal nature of the content. 

We have passed your concerns to the Prime Minister's Direct Communication Unit for reply, you should hear from them in due course.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
